channel.title: Help with auto restarter
channel.description:
i was working on an autostarter for my server. [code]@echo off :start Start call "Runserver.bat" call "run.bat" pause goto start [/code]
When i run it, the start call says 'runserver.bat' is not reconized as an internal or external command. How do i fix this?
Also i added another type of auto restarter. its a .jar file. It work, restarts the server. It resets the characters too far, like 1-2 minutes before the restart. Is there anyway to change this?

item.title: Help with auto restarter
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

yes, i just found mine, when i try to open it it

opens, then closes real fast. but says. voules auto restarter

is this right?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 08, 2009, 10:13:59 am[/size][hr]nvm i figured it out, thanks and sorry about wrong section

Read full topic

item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

A lot of sources have Voule’s Auto-restarter included in the download.

item.title: Help with auto restarter

item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

i was working on an autostarter for my server.

@echo off :start Start call "Runserver.bat" call "run.bat" pause goto start

When i run it, the start call says ‘runserver.bat’ is not reconized as an internal or external command.
How do i fix this?

Also i added another type of auto restarter. its a .jar file. It work, restarts the server. It resets the characters too far, like 1-2 minutes before the restart. Is there anyway to change this?
